name: AirBliss+®
slogan: Personal respiratory protection against air pollution
description: At AirBliss+ we are developing the best anti-pollution mask - a game-changing solution to mitigate the negative health impact of global air pollution for everyone living in polluted urban areas. We have an ambition to create strong social proof with our patented innovations and make our city a better place!

jobs.title: Marketing & Communications - Internship
jobs.description:
Are you looking for an opportunity in the field of media relations & marketing communications? At AirBliss+®, we now have a great opportunity for you as we gear towards a major global conference at the beginning of 2020!

AirBliss+® is a HealthTech hardware start-up developing the most comfortable, safe and smart anti-pollution mask for daily usage in the urban area. We are looking for an aspiring PR/media & marketing communication specialist to work with on the promo preparation, communication planning & media engagement for an upcoming global conference we have been selected to participate in early 2020. It is a fantastic opportunity to gain experience with an early-stage tech startup, a major global conference organizer as well as different media agencies. 

What we are looking for:

- You are enthusiastic, candid, with good energy
- Sense of aesthetics and a passion for quality products
- Experience with social media & content creation
- Interests in media relations and communications
- Love innovations and challenges
- Quick learner and always eager to learn more! 

If you are interested in this opportunity or have any questions, please don’t hesitate to get in touch with us at info@airblissplus.com.
